page.title: 07INDUSTRIAL ESTATE-BROADFORD
page.content: {The Harapul Industrial Estate} buildings are going to be used by people wishing to start a small business. It is not yet known how much they are going to cost to rent or the rateable value. As yet,none of the units have been taken but the H.R.C Development Department hope to build two more units in the future and there is already 28 interested parties.There are 4 workshops at present in the unit. The floor space is quite large with 500 square feet in each of the workshops.The workshops are like garages with a door beside each garage for pedestrian entrance.The unit is built next to the Old School which is now used as a youth club.
